Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: Computes diurnal soil and surface temperatures across a 1-D soil profile using a finite-difference heat diffusion scheme with phantom nodes. The model estimates volumetric specific heat from soil constituents (rocks, organic matter, sand, silt, clay, water, ice, air) and an effective thermal conductivity via a mixing approach. Energy balance at the surface includes net shortwave/longwave radiation, sensible and latent heat fluxes; net radiation can be calculated from solar geometry and cloud fraction or sourced from inputs. Atmospheric boundary-layer conductance is either fixed or iteratively computed using Monin–Obukhov stability concepts. A tridiagonal (Thomas) solver advances temperatures at sub-daily internal time-steps. Initial conditions use either user-provided temperatures or an annual harmonic driven by Tav/Amp and latitude. Based on Campbell (1985).
Description.ShortDescription: Heat flux and temperatures over the surface and soil profile (based on Campbell, 1985).

Input.name: defaultInstrumentHeight
Input.description: Default instrument height if none provided

Input.name: pInitialValues
Input.description: Initial soil temperatures by layer or None

Input.name: numPhantomNodes
Input.description: Number of phantom nodes below profile

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Soil evaporation at potential under canopy

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Current initial soil temperatures by layer (state carrier)

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Number of thermal nodes including phantom nodes

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Provisional updated node temperatures for current substep

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Air temperature used at air node in current step

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Water content by layer (and phantom layers)

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Minimum soil temperature recorded during day by node

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Maximum soil temperature recorded during day by node

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Average soil temperature accumulated during day by node

Input.name: aveSoilWater
Input.description: Average soil water tracker (optional, not updated here)

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Layer thickness including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rocks fraction including phantom layers array (1-indexed style)

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay fraction including phantom layers (1-indexed style)

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument height used for met measurements

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation used in surface energy balance at substeps

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Effective canopy height (m) derived from microclimate or roughness

Input.name: constantBoundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Constant boundary layer conductance if used

Input.name: numIterationsForBoundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Iterations for stability-coupled boundary layer conductance

Input.name: timestep
Input.description: External timestep span represented in a process call

Input.name: soilConstituentNames
Input.description: Constituent names used in mixture models

Output.name: InitialValues
Output.description: Initial soil temperatures by layer (state carrier)

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Current time of day in seconds at end of step

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Snapshot of soil temperatures near morning (5:00)

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Provisional updated temperatures after last substep

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Air temperature used at air node

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Max air temperature of previous day

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Min air temperature of previous day

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated water content by layer (and phantom layers)

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Minimum soil temperatures over the day by node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Maximum soil temperatures over the day by node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Average soil temperatures over the day by node

Output.name: aveSoilWater
Output.description: Average soil water over the day by node (optional)

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Effective canopy height (m) used in boundary layer calc

Output.name: instrumHeight
Output.description: Original measured instrument height passed through

Function.name: getIniVariables
Function.description: Pick instrument height from measured or default.

Function.name: getProfileVariables
Function.description: Builds profile arrays (thickness, nodeDepth, soil properties) and initialises temperature-related arrays.

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Compute thermal conductivity coefficient arrays from texture and bulk density.

Function.name: readParam
Function.description: Compute conductivity coefficients, initialise soil temperature profile, and set roughness height.

Function.name: getOtherVariables
Function.description: Update soil water from water balance and adjust instrument/canopy heights.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of ice (always 0 here).

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of water by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of clay by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of silt by layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of sand by layer.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Convert Celsius to Kelvin.

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division with error return.

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sum over a list segment ignoring MissingValue.

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Return specific heat by constituent name.

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of air as residual of other fractions.

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Air density from temperature and pressure.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Longwave radiation given emissivity and temperature.

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Interpolate layer values to nodes using depths and thickness.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Return conductance proxy for a constituent (note: code overrides with specific heat).

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Geometric shape factor by constituent for effective media model.

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Update daily min/max/avg soil temperatures and accumulate boundary layer conductance.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Thomas algorithm solver for tridiagonal system of heat balance to get new node temperatures.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Iteratively compute boundary layer conductance with stability corrections.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Interpolate net radiation at substep using SW and LW components.

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Diurnal air temperature interpolation using sinusoid.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Compute effective thermal conductivity and map to nodes.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Compute effective volumetric specific heat and map to nodes.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Zero an array in-place if not None.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Compute solar time distribution, cloud fraction and cva for a day.

Function.name: doProcess
Function.description: Main sub-daily loop: computes air temp, net radiation, boundary layer conductance, solves temperatures, and aggregates diagnostics.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Convert layer thicknesses to cumulative thickness.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Initialise soil temperature profile from annual sinusoid.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Estimate surface temperature from albedo, mean and max air T, and radiation.

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Check if an array contains at least one non-missing value.

Function.name: math_pi
Function.description: Return mathematical constant pi.

Function.name: math_sin
Function.description: Sine function.

Function.name: math_cos
Function.description: Cosine function.

Function.name: math_log
Function.description: Natural logarithm.

Function.name: math_exp
Function.description: Exponential function.

Function.name: is_nan
Function.description: Check NaN.
